title: Is the latest SNL season improving from before? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think so. I haven’t been a fan in 30 years but started watching again on the chance that they’ll have Alec Baldwin skewer Trump. But even those are becoming dull. I guess you can only go back to the well so many times. And the cast is too big! I don’t know half the performers when they do get 3 minutes of air time. How many are there nyway? 20? Back in the heyday they had 7 or 8 and they all had to WORK for their air time. Occasionally a writer like Bob Odenkirk would appear on stage or a filmed parody but you knew every member of the cast. So, having been watching again for the last 3 years or so, this season is definitely NOT better. So far into this season I can say I have laughed less than the previous seasons. The one spot I still look forward to is Weekend Update, when they don’t add some cast members doing their bits. I never got that “Guy with a boat” thing. What’s the ongoing joke there, Some pompous ass with a small penis? Oh, now I get it. Hilarious . . .NOT. Nope. NO Wayne’s Worlds here.
